<S%H2572>Fifty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H1980>went,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5048>opposite<s%> them at a <S%H7350>distance;<s%> and they <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> by the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

<S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H155>mantle,<s%> and wrapped it <S%H1563>together,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and they were <S%H2673>divided<s%> here and <S%H8147>there,<s%> so that they two went <S%H5674>over<s%> on dry <S%H2724>ground.<s%>

It <S%H1980>happened,<s%> as they still went <S%H1980>on,<s%> and <S%H1696>talked,<s%> that <S%H7393>behold,<s%> a chariot of <S%H784>fire<s%> and <S%H5483>horses<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6504>separated<s%> <S%H8147>them;<s%> <S%H996><s%> and <S%H452>Elijah<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> by a <S%H5591>whirlwind<s%> into <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

<S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H6817>it,<s%> and he cried, "My <S%H1>father,<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and its <S%H6571>horsemen!<s%>" He <S%H7200>saw<s%> him no <S%H2388>more:<s%> and he took hold of his own <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7167>tore<s%> them in <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7168>pieces.<s%>

He <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H155>mantle<s%> of <S%H452>Elijah<s%> that <S%H5307>fell<s%> from <S%H5221>him,<s%> and struck the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Where is <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H452>Elijah?<s%>" When he also had <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> they were <S%H2673>divided<s%> here and <S%H477>there;<s%> and Elisha went <S%H5674>over.<s%>

When the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> who were at <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> over against him <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> they said, "The <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H5117>rests<s%> on <S%H477>Elisha.<s%>" They <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H7812>him,<s%> and bowed themselves to the ground before <S%H776>him.<s%>

They <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3426>him,<s%> "See now, there are with your <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H2428>strong<s%> <S%H1121>men.<s%> Please let them <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H1245>seek<s%> your <S%H113>master.<s%> Perhaps the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has taken him <S%H5375>up,<s%> and <S%H7993>put<s%> him on <S%H259>some<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> or into <S%H259>some<s%> <S%H1516>valley.<s%> He <S%H559>said,<s%> "You shall not send <S%H7971>them.<s%>"

When they <S%H6484>urged<s%> him until he was <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7971>"Send<s%> <S%H7971>them.<s%>" They sent therefore <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H376>men;<s%> and they <S%H1245>searched<s%> for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> but <S%H4672>didn't<s%> find him.
They came <S%H7725>back<s%> to <S%H3427>him,<s%> while he stayed at <S%H3405>Jericho;<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> "Didn't I tell <S%H3212>you,<s%> 'Don't go?'"

The <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H477>Elisha,<s%> <S%H4186>"Behold,<s%> please, the situation of this <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H2896>pleasant,<s%> as my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H7200>sees;<s%> but the <S%H4325>water<s%> is <S%H7451>bad,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7921>miscarries.<s%>"
